    • Method Detail

      • addServiceCommands

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> addServiceCommands(java.lang.Boolean showAllServiceOfferings,
                                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> alreadyHandledServices)
        Add the needed services to the deploymentscript and try to match a suitable service from the provider.
        Parameters:
        alreadyHandledServices - services which are already created, so there have not to created twice
        showAllServiceOfferings - if yes then adds all service offerings to deploymentscript
